com.bbn.openmap.gui
Class CoordPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.bbn.openmap.gui.CoordPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
DMSCoordPanel, MGRSCoordPanel, UTMCoordPanel
public class CoordPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.io.Serializable

CoordPanel is a simple gui with entry boxes and labels for latitude and longitude. It sets the center of a map with the entered coordinates by firing CenterEvents.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setLatLon

public void setLatLon(LatLonPoint llpoint)
Sets the contents of the latitude and longitude entry boxes.

Parameters:
llpoint - the object containt the coordinates that should go in the boxes. If null, text boxes will be cleared.
